Body:
"""Test get_details returns details for a record ID."""
info = cs.get_details(6543)
assert all(field in info for field in ['id', 'smiles', 'formula',
    'averageMass', 'molecularWeight', 'monoisotopicMass', 'nominalMass',
    'commonName', 'referenceCount', 'dataSourceCount', 'pubMedCount',
    'rscCount', 'mol2D'])
assert all(isinstance(info[field], float) for field in ['averageMass',
    'molecularWeight', 'monoisotopicMass'])
assert isinstance(info['id'], int)
assert all(isinstance(info[field], six.text_type) for field in ['smiles',
    'formula', 'commonName', 'mol2D'])
